title: By the King. A proclamation for the speedy calling in of all sheriffes, escheators, receivers, fee-farmers, farmers of recusants lands, and all other tenants who hold of the King in capite by knights-service, to pay His Majesties duties at his exchequer at Oxford.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Universitie,
notes: Dated at end: Given at our court at Oxford, the 25. of March in the twentieth year of our raigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
